data.name: My Time At Portia - NPC Eveningwear Package
data.detailed_description:
The Mysterious Man has visited Portia a third time! This eccentric businessman spends his time travelling the world collecting fashionable clothes from different cities. During his latest visit to Portia, he decided to gift several residents stunning new clothes for a high-end soiree.


In this pack you will receive an alternative outfit for each of the following in-game NPCs:

-Arlo (Dapper Voyageur)
-Dr Xu (Sky Captain)
-Emily (White Dahlia)
-Ginger (Newlywed Gown)
-Gust (Lord Gustingsworth)
-Mint (Sleepy Formal)
-Phyllis (Stellar Belle)
-Sam (White Shadow)
data.about_the_game:
The Mysterious Man has visited Portia a third time! This eccentric businessman spends his time travelling the world collecting fashionable clothes from different cities. During his latest visit to Portia, he decided to gift several residents stunning new clothes for a high-end soiree.


In this pack you will receive an alternative outfit for each of the following in-game NPCs:

data.short_description: New Player Costume and NPC Eveningwear packs available
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, French, German, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+ / 8.1 / 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI 7770, Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.15 +
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
